Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory216.png'}
{1: '1', 2: '???A', 3: "Staessen, my man! Haven't seen you around these parts in a while.", 4: '1'}
{2: '???B', 3: "Yeah, it's been quite some time.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Staessen', 3: "Yeah, the ARU has had their hands full with Derek and Amberia. We've left you out in the cold.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Staessen', 3: 'Long time no see, Antonov, Sergey.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sergey', 3: "Oh, it's not worth your time here in the Border Commune, all out in the rurals.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Staessen', 3: "Don't say that, Sergey. We want to solve your problems, too.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Antonov', 3: "Save it, Staessen. If you give us enough supplies, maybe we'll consider changing our standpoint.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Antonov', 3: "So, what's the reason behind this long-awaited reunion?", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sergey', 3: 'Indeed. What brings you here, Staessen?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Antonov', 3: 'Sergey, what did I say? Do you still think we can live in harmony with these fools, cheapskates, and scum of the earth on this ice field?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Antonov', 3: 'As I said before, give your ****ing delusions up, son of a*****.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Sergey', 3: '...Staessen.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Staessen', 3: "Just say it. What's the matter?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sergey', 3: 'This isn\'t just a "matter." You\'re outright killing us.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Antonov', 3: "Staessen, you didn't ****ing come here to take back the Moses icebreakers without knowing, did you? Or do you believe the lies the Kyaranta dumbasses told you?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Antonov', 3: "Forget it, I'll quit the bull****. Let's take you to the dock.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Antonov', 3: "It's not safe along the way. Watch out for Corrupted.", 4: '2'}
